Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.DownloadContracts.Bitmapable

  • Packages that use DownloadContracts.Bitmapable 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
    Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.

    • Uses of DownloadContracts.Bitmapable in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

      Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download with type parameters of type DownloadContracts.Bitmapable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasisBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable>
      An implementation of the CoreBitmapDownloader class, which is independent from the Android platform.
      static class  BasisDownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable>
      An implementation of the BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.
      static interface  BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable>
      Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
      static class  BasisDownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable> 
      class  CoreBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable>
      Responsible for downloading the bitmaps in dedicated threads and to bind them to Android Views.
